title: ARAM - Bronze vs Challenger
body:
A lot of the team I'm paired with are always people in Bronze to Gold, while the other teams seem to have Plat to Diamond. Just currently in my last game I was vsing against a Diamond Ranked Sona.

I'm sure many people are having this, seriously it's not fun vsing people who have more experience in the game then you do. Our scores were from 12-44. My team did end up flaming and blaming each other. 

It was until after the game I checked all their profiles. Their play styles seemed really to well to be in silver/bronze.

Any ways I'm pretty sure low ranked players will be having this issue. Highly occurs in ARAM.

replies.body: Who actually cares? It's ARAM. That's like going to a fun run and complaining when Usian Bolt shows up.
Welcome to Las Vegas, where the tables are always turned against you.
This is League not Los Vegas. Please head South from here.

Why not? There's more joy in fighting difficult opponents!

As long as there aren't AFKs I am happy, the new leave buster really smacks them hard, love it.
Not fun being %%%% on every aram game now is it?

> Why not? There's more joy in fighting difficult opponents!

This. I played a match a few hours ago where I was the only Bronzie and everyone else was Diamond.
I learned a lot, it was great fun.
Bump. This %%%% is still happening no fun at all.
